content:
All posts from all social networks (including blockchains) should be linked; That's the purpose of Peeper.

Also, all videos from all media platforms should be linked on the same main profile and their channels. That's the purpose of Netvision.

Both Peeper and Netvision haves more characteristics than these. #PostWithIdea 26/02/19 21:03 #BB

Comment:

This is the first comment on a "post" in Omni Notes FOSS mobile app.
The described characteristics on this post aren't exclusive of Peeper or NeTVision; they're now a open spec called Omni-Link  8/2/19 8:40 PM
